name: Chromicum sulphuricum
details: In locomotor ataxia, goitre, PROSTATIC HYPERTROPHY. Herpes preputialis. Wry neck. Also exophthalmic, inhibits the vagus, relieving tachycardia. Acts like a nerve tonic where there is lack of nervous tone. Fibroid tumors. Infantile paralysis. Dose for adults, 3 to 5 grains after meals and at bedtime.
